title: Macaroni Mince
ingredients: ['250g macaroni, boiled', '700g beef mince, browned', '1 onion, chopped', '1 small tube tomato puree', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', 'White sauce', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons flour', 'pinch salt', '1L milk', '75g cheese (Cheddar is good)', '2 eggs, beaten', 'dried breadcrumbs (optional)']
